summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from August 26, 2019, forwarding an update on the Epstein investigation. It discusses coordination between FBI divisions (CID and NY) regarding the preparation and distribution of the update, noting that specific agents have reviewed the information.

persons.name: ASC Dimenna
persons.context: Mentioned as having reviewed the information contained in the attached Epstein investigation update.

persons.name: UC Skiles
persons.context: Mentioned alongside ASC Dimenna as having reviewed the information contained in the attached Epstein investigation update.

persons.name: SSA - Violent Crime Unit
persons.context: The sender of the initial email providing the Epstein investigation update.

events.title: Epstein Investigation Update Distribution
events.description: An update on the Epstein investigation is prepared and distributed via internal FBI email and portal. A standing call is scheduled between CID and NY FBI divisions.

keyFacts: The document is an internal FBI email chain dated August 26, 2019, concerning the Epstein investigation.
It indicates active coordination and information sharing between the FBI's Criminal Investigative Division (CID) and the New York (NY) field office.
The attached investigation update had been reviewed by FBI agents ASC Dimenna and UC Skiles before distribution.
